targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` [$__interval]))
sum by(msg) (count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg =~ `^block validation.*` [$__interval]))
sum(count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg =~ `^incorrect prev_randao.*` [$__interval]))
sum by(msg) (count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg = `prev_randao is not known yet` [$__interval]))
sum(count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg =~ `^already have a newer payload.*` [$__interval]))

sum by(msg) (count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg = `rejecting submission because payload for this slot was already delivered` [$__interval]))
sum(count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg =~ `^could not find slot duty` [$__interval]))

sum by(msg) (count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg !~ `^block validation.*` | msg !~ `^incorrect prev_randao.*` | msg != `prev_randao is not known yet` | msg !~ `^already have a newer payload.*` | msg != `received block from builder` | msg != `rejecting submission because payload for this slot was already delivered` | msg != `could not find slot duty` [$__interval]))
sum by(slot) (count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` [$__range]))
sum by(slot) (count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg =~ `^block validation successful.*` [$__range]))
sum by(slot) (count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg =~ `^block validation failed.*` [$__range]))
sum by(slot) (count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg =~ `^incorrect prev_randao.*` [$__range]))
sum by(slot) (count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg = `prev_randao is not known yet` [$__range]))
sum by(slot) (count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg =~ `^already have a newer payload.*` [$__range]))

sum by(slot) (count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg = `rejecting submission because payload for this slot was already delivered` [$__range]))

sum by(slot, namespace) (count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg !~ `^block validation.*` | msg !~ `^incorrect prev_randao.*` | msg != `prev_randao is not known yet` | msg !~ `^already have a newer payload.*` | msg != `received block from builder` | msg != `rejecting submission because payload for this slot was already delivered` [$__range]))
count by(slot) (count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} |= `` | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg = `received block from builder` [$__range]))
sum by(builderPubkey) (count_over_time({namespace="$Namespace", app="relay-api-builder"} |= `` | logfmt | method = `submitNewBlock` | msg = `received block from builder` [$__range]))

panels.description: The validation queue length as reported by the priority queue. These are blocks that have been added to the queue but not picked up by a worker routine. Reported as soon as a block as added to the queue, so minimum is 1.

targets.expr: {namespace="$Namespace", app="block-queue"} |= `Request added to queue`
